name: Zoolz
overview:
Zoolz is a cloud-based file protection,sharing and mobile access service. It enables users to mirror the contents of their laptops, desktops, servers and network drives on Amazon’s S3 Cloud. Users can access their files on Zoolz through a stand-alone web interface, a Facebook app, or an iPad/iPhone app.

Zoolz takes a social approach to cloud file storage through integration with Facebook allowing users to share media files without uploading. It also is built with groups in mind and ability to share storage space with colleagues and family. All data is encrypted at source and sent over a secure channel.

Zoolz is currently on the lookout for funding.
